name: Ckap industry
description:
Hello ! Here's our game made for Quarantine game jam ! A game about packaging stuff like PokeBall, Milk and more ! Here you need to pickup all object that pass in your yellow are before they pass out of the screen ! Gain score, win your objectives and upgrade on stage for even more Score, point and boxes !!!! 

And if you are a challenger you can try to beat our best score and entry on our LeaderBoard ! Just send a screenshote in the comment and you will be register in the leaderboard.

LEADERBOARD :
1 - Kuzaikage with a score of 5983
This game was made by Raze(Tribal games) and kuzaikage in 3 days.
